subject: Order Nr 5675
description_text: Good day, I placed an order on 01/02/2026 (order no. #SSN5675) and since 01/08/2026 the package has been reported as being in transit (tracking no. SF6047224804910). Unfortunately, there is no information available about the shipment. When will it arrive? Best regards Sascha Welter Gesendet von Outlook für Android

conversations.body_text: Hi Sascha Welter,  Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224804910
Thank you very much for your response. Is it possible to withdraw from the purchase argument and cancel the order before the shipment? Best regards Sascha Welter Gesendet von Outlook für Android
Hi Sascha Welter,  I apologize for the delayed response.  We have confirmed that your order was shipped on the 14th and cannot be canceled.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224804910
